text: hey guys, i'm using HubSpot Contacts api using ruby gem. I'm using find_by_email and fetch_all methods and the results are not what i'm expecting. There are contacts that are in the db but find_by_email returns nil. Fetch all returns 20 as total count when there's 2k+ contacts in the db.
UPDATE: i found that the default return is 20 and can be increased to 100
